quest.name: Have I Got News for You
journal:
Eshana longs to know what tomorrow brings.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Gather prophetic stones from Pike Falls.
Deliver the prophetic stones to the Ananta whispermaid.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: The Velodyna Gatekeepers have done excellent work thus far monitoring our borders, but Alpa fears they grow complacent for lack of any serious threatsss.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: In the hopesss of motivating them, I thought we might revive one of the Ananta's more ancient traditions─divinationsss.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: To divine the fortunes of war, custom dictates one versssed in its art gather three precious stones required for the ritual. I can think of none better than you for this task.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: When you have procured the gems we require, deliver them to the Ananta whissspermaid.

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: To read the fortunes of war I require three prophetic ssstones. No more, no lesss. Bring them to me and all shall be revealed.

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: You are returned. Have you the prophetic ssstones I require?

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: These shall do nicely. Now, let us sssee what the future holds for the Velodyna Gatekeepers.

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: Yesss, the misssts are clearing.

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: Great peril awaits in the days ahead. Calamity born from carelessness. They would do well not to lose focusss lest this future come to pass.

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: Ah! I see great successs for the Gatekeepers! The efforts of their training shall be returned three─nay, four-fold!

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: Ahem. My apologies. 'Tis not often fortune sssmiles so favorably upon us.

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: Ah! Great fortune awaits the Gatekeepers! An unexpected windfall for the benefit of all!

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: Ahem. Forgive me. It has been too long since fortune has sssmiled upon us so favorably.

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: Hmmm... The future is riddled with uncertainty, but I sssense the potential for discord within our ranksss. Geniality is more important now than ever.

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: I foresee a fortuitous meeting. Newly formed ties should be treated with the greatessst of care. In doing so we shall not want for allies in times of strife.

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: The power of the stones is spent, and thusss the vision ends.

dialogue.name: ANANTAREADER03042
dialogue.text: I would stay, but my sisters in Vira Nilya have need of my insssight. Pray tell Eshana what I have seen.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Forename. What did she have to say of our future? What fortune awaitsss the Gatekeepers?

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Interesting... I will make certain my sssisters hear of this and act accordingly. The word of a whissspermaid is not to be taken lightly.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Though not always clear, their divinations remain in our thoughts, guiding our actions in the hopes of a desirable outcome. I daresay you too would do well to adhere to her words. It may prove to your benefit.
